Text: Great, but why Canadians (I'm one myself, but english speaking)....are there any GOOD french tenors? And than I mean REAL frenchies??!!

Encore un canadien anglais ignorant et stupide. Sont-ils tous racistes? Je crois que oui. De toute façon qui accorde de l'importance à ces quantités négligeables. Voici pour ces bâtards ignorants un message sans équivoque:
Go to hell you stupid english speaking piece of shit.
i would love to kick the toilet bowl you call your head. You and your alike can disappear from the 
surface of earth and it will be welcome as a good riddance. Eat your own shit as usual that's the only thing you do well.
Bz de Gallixia
